name: Never A Matter Of Time
description:
Description:

Never A Matter Of Time is a visual novel where you play as Emma, a snarky girl who lives her life normally, but then, time stops entirely! How will she be able to go back to normal? Can she even go back to normal or is she stuck here forever?

I mean, it's not like she's completely alone, but when the only other person she can talk to is a complete stranger named Steven from her high school, it's definitely going to be tough to see things positively...

Features:

-21,000 words for a total of around 1 to 2 hours of playtime

-Wholesomeness

-Many alternate scenes where you need multiple playthroughs to see everything

-Wholesomeness

-2 endings

-Wholesomeness

-Completely original art and soundtrack

-Wholesomeness

-A walkthrough flowchart available to download

-Did I mention wholesomeness?

-I don't think I did, so...

-Wholesomeness
